config.spotsPerLocation.name: Spots per location
config.spotsPerLocation.tooltip: How many pan spots to attempt to add to each eligible location per day.
config.maxPlacementAttempts.name: Placement attempts
config.maxPlacementAttempts.tooltip: How many random tiles to check when adding pan spots per location.
config.allowBeach.name: Allow beach
config.allowBeach.tooltip: Adds pan spots to The Beach and other saltwater locations.
config.allowGroundSpots.name: Allow ground spots
config.allowGroundSpots.tooltip: Occasionally place pan spots on land tiles next to water for easier reach.
config.dropExtraTreasure.name: Drop extra treasure
config.dropExtraTreasure.tooltip: Drop an extra custom treasure item whenever you finish panning.
config.replaceVanillaTreasure.name: Replace vanilla treasure
config.replaceVanillaTreasure.tooltip: If true, the vanilla panning drop is removed and replaced with the custom treasure (when possible).
config.showIndicator.name: Show indicator
config.showIndicator.tooltip: Show a HUD hint pointing toward the nearest pan spot while holding a pan.
config.indicatorScale.name: Indicator scale
config.indicatorScale.tooltip: Scale multiplier (in percent) for the HUD indicator text.
config.maxIndicatorDistance.name: Indicator range
config.maxIndicatorDistance.tooltip: How far (in tiles) the HUD indicator searches for a pan spot before hiding itself.
